data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 636,600 souls in Khost and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khost, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 101 believers in the state of Khost to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Khost, Afghanistan to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 636,499 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Khost, Afghanistan. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Hazara people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Khost to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, please give the 101 believers in the state of Khost the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.section_summary:
the state of Khost, Afghanistan has a population of 636,600.

We estimate Khost has 101 people who might know Jesus, 20 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 636,479 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6,302 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Khost an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

location.name: Khost
